mapper.sql: A.UID AS UID, A.BOP_NO AS BOPNO, A.CHG_TMS_CNT AS CHGTMSCNT, A.ACMP_FORM_SEQNO AS ACMPFORMSEQNO, B.ATTR_NAME AS ACMPFORMTYPECD, A.ACMP_FORM_NO AS ACMPFORMNO, A.FIXD_NO AS FIXDNO, A.ACMP_FORM_FILE_NM AS ACMPFORMFILENM, A.ETPS_PREENT_NO AS ETPSPREENTNO, A.RMK AS RMK, A.SEQ_NO AS SEQNO
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM EMS_BWS_CUS_ACMP_FORM_DT A LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES B ON B.ATTR_VALUE = A.ACMP_FORM_TYPECD AND B.DICTIONARY_VALUE='ACMP_FORM_TYPECD' WHERE A.SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}
